title: AutoDRIVE-F1TENTH-Autoware Integration
description: This work focuses on developing autonomy-oriented digital twins of vehicles across different scales and configurations to help support the streamlined development and deployment of Autoware Core/Universe stack.

title: Digital Twin of F1TENTH in AutoDRIVE Simulator - A First Look
description: AutoDRIVE is envisioned to be a comprehensive, flexible, and integrated ecosystem for autonomous driving research and education.

title: Model- and Acceleration-based Pursuit Controller for High-Performance Autonomous Racing
description: The video describes the MAP controller, highlighting how it differs from the standard Pure Pursuit algorithm.

title: The Fast and the Autonomous
description: A fleet of pint-size cars that can see and navigate independently, winning races for the team of UNC computer science students that created them.

title: Adventures in Autonomous Vehicles

title: Engineering Out Loud: The Age of Autonomous Vehicles
